attributes.action: Require meat to be clearly labelled as "Unfit for humane consumption" unless produced to high animal welfare standards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Meat eaters have principles and moral values too, and need to be protected against accidentally eating or being fed meat which is does not fit with their ethical stance on animal welfare, just like vegetarians need warnings about animal content in food so they can make their choice too.

Animal welfare standards should be defined and agreed by the RSPCA, the Farm Animal Welfare Council, Compassion in World Farming, World Society for the Protection of Animals etc.

Public money should NEVER be spent on meat that does not reach these standards and it should never be served in schools, the army etc.  In any case, it should be clearly labelled "unfit for humane consumption" so people can make their choice.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
